group_1.textLeft: Uuu~n... This isn't it.

group_1.textRight: What isn't?

group_1.textLeft: After I got Kaede and everyone's opinions, I started@drawing my manga right away...
But I'm feeling a little differently about it.

group_1.textRight: Hmm.

group_1.textLeft: I want you to look at this, Alina-senpai.

group_1.textRight: ... Alina wants to burn this immediately.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101202:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Don't do that!@The hospital will burn down with it!
... But you're right, it isn't very good.
I listened to their ideas,
put a pumpkin in the background and had the@main character dress up,
give out candy everywhere she goes,
and I had her say "[textRed:trick or treat]" but...
Well, the character's grand entrance had no@Halloween spirit at all!

group_1.textRight: First of all, is "[textRed:trick or treat]" even the norm@for Halloween?
You've made a strange arrangement of other@people's opinions.

group_1.textLeft: This is Magical Kirin's greatest quote of quotes!
As a true MagiKirinite, that is non-negotiable!

group_1.textRight: Who cares, though...

group_1.textLeft: ... Kaede and her friends didn't really help@with their ideas.
Setting pumpkins, dressing in costumes,
and saying trick or treat as Halloweeny things,
I thought those ideas would be too normal for@kids who don't draw...

group_1.textRight: ... Shit.

group_1.textLeft: I'd appreciate it if you didn't whisper verbal@abuse at me!

group_1.textRight: It's because Alina is getting irritated.
The only reason you draw that manga is to get@back at that girl, ya know.

group_1.textLeft: That's right!@I want to prove myself to Kaede!

group_1.textRight: If that's true, then the one evaluating is not YOU,@but that girl.
Even if you are an amateur, if that girl says@it feels like Halloween,
then she is who's correct.
Even if all galleries are full of amateurs,
if all of them agree it feels like Halloween,
then that IS what Halloween feels like.
No one will give a damn about fool girl's viewpoint.

group_1.textLeft: Then, to have Kaede gasp and be left speechless...
No, something even greater than that,
is to draw a manga that everyone will agree
and say "now this is Halloween"...?

group_1.textRight: Alina has no interest in any of this, so there is@no advice to give.
Go get a suitable audience instead of asking@for Alina's opinions.
It would be MORE preferable to have the majority's vote, si?

group_1.textLeft: I knew it...@I haven't been taking this seriously enough.

group_1.textRight: What? ... Serious?

group_1.textLeft: Creating a truly Halloweeny character!
To make the greatest Halloween manga,
I should have been gathering opinions from tons@and tons of people.
I've heard that even manga magazines make use@of the results from reader questionnaires,
and take them very seriously.
Once I'm discharged, I'm going to get lots of friends,
and I'll listen to all kinds of opinions!

group_1.textRight: What will you do until discharged?

group_1.textLeft: There's another manga I want to draw,@so I'm going to sketch the storyboard for it.
Once it's done, I want you to look at it too,@Alina-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Ambition is the only thing you're brimming with...

group_1.textLeft: It's all thanks to Alina-senpai that my path@is now clear!
Thanks a ton for all your advice!

group_1.textRight: Advice...?@[chara:100802:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:100802:lipSynch_1][chara:100802:motion_200]I didn't really...

group_1.narration: And then a short time later...@The day I would be discharged came.
